sourcesContent:
<template>

  <HeaderMainPage></HeaderMainPage>

  <UserSingleTemplate></UserSingleTemplate>


</template>


<script>

import UserSingleTemplate from "@/components/UserSingleTemplate.vue";
import HeaderMainPage from "@/components/HeaderMainPage.vue";

export default {
  components: {
    UserSingleTemplate,
    HeaderMainPage,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      user: ""
    }
  },
  methods: {
    mounted() {
      const postId = this.$route.params.id;

      fetch("http://localhost:3000/api/users/:id" + postId)
        .then(response => {
          console.log(response)
        })
    }
  }

}


</script>


<style scoped>
</style>
